
Changelog
=========

0.2.0 (2019-10-26)
------------------

- added :code:`cli_report`

0.1.1 (2019-10-26)
------------------

- corrected libio
- trajectory loads based on MDAnalysis now read and concatenate multiple trajectories.

0.1.0 (2019-10-26)
------------------

- added interfaces:
  - :code:`trajedit`
  - :code:`noSol`
  - :code:`imagemol`
  - :code:`rmsd`
  - :code:`cli template`

0.0.0 (2019-10-15)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
